snippet: National security officials reported that the number of "confirmed" cases in which former detainees previously held at the prison at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, engaged in terrorist or insurgent activity after their transfer had risen between October 2010...
abstract: National security officials reported that the number of "confirmed" cases in which former detainees previously held at the prison at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, engaged in terrorist or insurgent activity after their transfer had risen between October 2010 and December 2011.

headline.main: Report Links Ex-Detainees to Terrorism and Insurgency
